content: wool dryer balls are a wonderfully simple way to make your electric clothes dryer more efficient while reducing static and eliminating the need for dryer sheets and fabric softener they are simple and quick to make are super for stash-busting yarn leftover from other wool projects and they make wonderful gifts completed balls can be stored in a lidded container with essential oils dropped on them for an aromatherapy boost these also make fantastic cat toys my kitties used to steal them all the time note about yarns yarns listed are only suggestions as i have made these in all sorts of 100% non-superwash wools go stash-diving
